info.name: Clear LinkedIn 2017
info.description: UPDATED TO THE NEW SITE VERSION | Recently Updated | Removes ALL Ads | Removes all instances of "Try Premium" | Minimal Style | More details below
info.additionalInfo: Ads Removes Sponsored feeds Removes Ads on top Removes sidebar Ads Try Premium Removes all instances of Try Premium version through the site Removes from the feeds 'Jobs you may be interested in' 'Popular course you may be interested in' 'People you may know' 'X connections made in your network' Removes from the sidebasr 'Never lose touch with your contacts' 'Who to follow' 'You have more contacts to connect with' Removes from the navbar 'Add connections' button Style Darker header for more contrast Removes text from nav icons Removes number of connections and 'Grow your networks' from main page Transforms 'Who's viewed your profile' to a proper button Removes sidebars' footers (About, Help, ...) Check out my other styles: Clear Pinterest Clear Facebook Clear Youtube Clear Feedly Clear Twitter
